author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-Shanxi Xinghuacun Fen Wine Factory's Shareholder To Cut Stake

organizations.name: reuters) - shanxi xinghuacun fen wine factory co ltd

text:
Feb 2 (Reuters) - Shanxi Xinghuacun Fen Wine Factory Co Ltd 600809.SS>:
* SAYS CONTROLLING SHAREHOLDER PLANS TO SELL ABOUT 11.45 PERCENT STAKE IN THE COMPANY TO CHINA RESOURCESâ€™ AFFILIATE, NO AGREEMENT SIGNED YET
* SAYS SHARE TRADE TO RESUME ON FEB 5 Source text in Chinese: bit.ly/2FAQNY0 Further company coverage: (Reporting by Hong Kong newsroom)
